resources.string: Please note: You cannot store more than four responses before going online. If needed make a note of extra email addresses and add when you are online.
Skip Quiz (for close family and friends)

Read the words at the bottom and tap the screen when you get to the third to last word so that you can seamlessly flow onto the words on the next screen. Please practice until you have a good flow. Go to traintoproclaim.com for a video tutorial on how to use this App.

string-array.name: tickerTexts
string-array.item: The following is a summary of the message of the entire Bible …
The Bible says that God is holy
when God created the world; He made people perfect to have a friendship with Him.
The Bible also says that. All of us have a
soul. At death your body is
Now do you know anyone who has never broken any of God\'s laws?

string-array.name: appTexts
string-array.item: Do you know anyone who has never broken any of God\'s laws?

string-array.name: quiz_Array
string-array.item: 5. I forgive people when they hurt me
6. I love and help family members
7. I am loyal with my friendships
8. I put other people first when they need me
9. I am totally honest in the things I say and do
10. I see the best in people

string-array.name: quiz_narrate_array
string-array.item: I give to charities. 5 is always, 1 is never. What would you give yourself?
I pray. 5 is every day, 1 is never in your life. Not even when you are in trouble!
Well you are helping me today
5 is you browse it quite often, 1 is you have never held it in your hand
This is hard to do sometimes
You are putting me first today!
Do you see the best or the worst in people, or a bit of both?
